forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
